About the Company: Maruti Suzuki India Limited (MSIL) is engaged in the business of manufacture, purchase and sale of motor vehicles, automobile components and spare parts (automobiles). The other activities of the Company consist of facilitation of pre-owned car sales, fleet management and car financing. The Companys portfolio includes the Maruti 800, Alto 800, Alto K10, A-star, Estilo, WagonR, Ritz, Swift, Swift DZire, SX4, Omni, Eeco, Kizashi, Grand Vitara, Gypsy, Ertiga and Stingray. The Companys services include Finance, Insurance, Maruti Genuine Accessories, Maruti Genuine Parts, Maruti Driving School and Autocard.
